Key Match Events: India defeated Bangladesh by 86 runs in the second T20I match
Nitish Reddy scored 74 runs and picked 2 wickets, becoming 'Player of the Match'
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav, India captain, expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The third T20I match will be played in Hyderabad on October 12
